basic.enabled.name: Enable mod
basic.enabled.tip: Turn this on to apply daily friendship decay rebalance.
basic.cap.name: Decay even at cap
basic.cap.tip: Apply daily decay even if vanilla would cap it.
basic.strict.name: Strict override (exact target loss)
basic.strict.tip: Ignores vanilla change and enforces your target loss exactly.
scale.global.name: Global loss scale
ranges.0to4.name: Loss at 0-4 hearts
ranges.5to8.name: Loss at 5-8 hearts
ranges.9.name: Loss at 9 hearts
ranges.10plus.name: Loss at 10+ hearts (non-spouse)
spouse.10to12.name: Spouse loss at 10-12 hearts
spouse.13to14.name: Spouse loss at 13-14 hearts
nogreet.points.name: Extra penalty (points)
nogreet.scale.name: Scale by hearts
mode.nogreetonly.name: Decay only when not greeted
mode.nogreetonly.tip: If you talked to them that day, no decay applies. (Tip: enable 'Auto-correct final decay' for exact values)
greetdecay.section.tip: Even if you greeted them, apply a small decay when weekly gifts are below the target.
greetdecay.enable.name: Decay on greet if weekly gifts missed
greetdecay.enable.tip: Applies a small decay on greeted days when you haven't met the weekly gift quota.
greetdecay.required.name: Required gifts per week
greetdecay.required.tip: How many gifts per week to avoid the greeted-day decay (e.g. 2).
greetdecay.mode.name: Decay mode on greeted days
greetdecay.mode.tip: Choose how greeted-day decay is computed when gifts are below target.
greetdecay.ratio.name: Ratio (of normal decay)
greetdecay.ratio.scale.name: Scale by missing count
greetdecay.ratio.scale.tip: If you required 2 gifts and gave 1, apply only half of the ratio.
greetdecay.flat.name: Flat decay (points)
greetdecay.flat.tip: Fixed points applied on greeted days when gifts are below target.
limit.daily.name: Max daily decay (hearts)
limit.daily.tip: Caps total daily decay. Example: 0.40 ≈ 100 points.
limit.nogreet.name: Max no-greet extra (hearts)
limit.nogreet.tip: Caps additional decay applied when you didn't greet.
hud.nogreet: You didn't talk to {{name}}; friendship decreased by {{amount}}.
hud.nogift: You didn't give a gift to {{name}}; friendship decreased by {{amount}}.
penalties.tip: Extra friendship loss for certain actions.
pen.trash.enable.tip: Apply extra loss when you give trash-like items.
pen.trash.ids.tip: Override the default list if you want.
pen.sling.enable.tip: Apply extra loss when you hit a villager with a slingshot.
hud.toggle.name: Show HUD notifications
hud.toggle.tip: Display on-screen toast for friendship changes. Turn off for silent mode.
